Container.Name: abs-autoconverter-unraid
Container.Overview: ABS AutoConverter automatically converts media in your Plex/Emby/Jellyfin libraries using the ABS API. It supports scheduled conversions, bitrate control, parallel processing, and optional library refreshes. This container is built from the open-source project by shadowplace1, licensed under MIT.

Config.Name: DOMAIN
Config.Description: Base URL of your ABS server (e.g. http(s)://192.168.1.10:7878 or http(s)://myABSserver.com)

Config.Name: LIBRARIES
Config.Description: Comma-separated list of library IDs to convert (e.g. 1,2,3)

Config.Name: MAX_PARALLEL_CONVERSIONS
Config.Description: How many conversions to run at once per library

Config.Name: LIBRARY_REFRESH_WAIT
Config.Description: Seconds to wait after refreshing a library

Container.DonateText: If you find this useful, consider supporting the developer.
